sentences.en: a house in a pleasant suburban district
sentences.cn: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

sentences.en: A new town has grown up in this industrial district.
sentences.cn: 在这个工业区兴起了一座新城市.

sentences.en: A number of unruly youth ganged up and terrorized the district.
sentences.cn: 一些不法青年结成一伙,使这个地区充满恐怖.

sentences.en: A number of unruly youths ganged up and terrorized the district.
sentences.cn: 一些不法青年结成一伙,使这个地区陷于恐怖.

sentences.en: He was very well thought of all over the district.
sentences.cn: 他在整个地区评价很高.

sentences.en: I have walked this district for ten kilometres round.
sentences.cn: 我已跑遍了这一地区附近10公里内的范围.

sentences.en: In the past this district was very hard to get to.
Street committees keep a weather eye on the families in their district.
sentences.cn: 街道委员会留意所辖区域内的家家户户。

sentences.en: the City of London's financial district
The district council agreed with the objectors and turned down the application.
sentences.cn: 区政务委员会同意反对者的意见，拒绝了这一申请。

sentences.en: The district is fertile of wheat.
The district is pock-marked with caves.
The district is under consideration for designation as a conservation area.
sentences.cn: 正在考虑将这个地区指定为保护区。

sentences.en: the incharge of the district hospital
The people in this district keep the Sabbath.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的人遵守安息日.

sentences.en: This district is getting more and more prosperous and bustling.

phrases.tran_cn: 哥伦比亚特区（美国联邦直辖区）
联邦特区（联邦政府所在地区，等于Federal District）

trans.tran_en: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features
